lootables.config.tileStackingStyle.desc: How choice tiles are laid out in the GUI.
Tiles are laid out in one row horizontally. If there are too many tiles for the screen STACKED will be used.
lootables.config.choiceStyle.STACKED.des: Tiles are stacked in two rows. If there are two or fewer choices HORIZONTAL will be used.
lootables.config.easeInTiles.desc: Whether tiles should have an animated 'slide-in' when a choice GUI is opened
lootables.config.easeInDuration.desc: How long in ticks the ease-in takes to complete.
lootables.config.easeInAmount.desc: How far down the screen in pixels tiles start when they begin their ease-in
lootables.config.animateTileHover.desc: Whether tiles should smoothly transition to their hovered 'glowing' color scheme. No animation will transition colors instantly
lootables.config.hoverDelay.desc: How long in ticks it takes for a tile to fully 'glow' when hovered
lootables.config.tileWidth.desc: How many pixels wide a choice tile is
lootables.config.tileHeight.desc: How many pixels high a choice tile is
lootables.entry.function: Apply modifiers to items in your %s slot(s)
